short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enhances CTRL+F search, highlighting and blinking. Customize settings for a better search experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extention attempts to solve my issue with finding the position of matching terms in a CTRL+F search. When the user interacts with the ctrl+f popup, either by changing the term or finding the next or prior occurence, the line containing the term blinks for a short time, configurable in the options page. Please consider contributing to the project on github: 
https://github.com/bearkillerPT/accessibleChromeFindInPage
